2016.tpci.raikou.bundle.2: Zap Cannon Time with the Raikou Bundle!
2016.tpci.raikou.bundle.3: Raikou’s Zap Cannon attack puts some lightning in your life! This foil Legendary Pokémon also comes with three 10-card booster packs from the Pokémon TCG: HeartGold & SoulSilver expansion!
2016.tpci.raikou.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 1 foil Raikou Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, HGSS19) 3 Pokémon TCG: HeartGold & SoulSilver booster packs (10-card) These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through August 15, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
2017.avatar.salazzle.description: Reveal your fiery side with the intense Salazzle Trainer Set.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Confused, this attack does 90 more damage.
Move any number of damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon to their other Pokémon in any way you like.
This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Your opponent discards 4 cards from their hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. The new Active Pokémon is now Confused.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

This foil Legendary Pokémon also comes with three 10-card booster packs from the Pokémon TCG: HeartGold & SoulSilver expansion! These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition.

This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.

tpci.2017.special.challenge.big-splash.d: Knock Out 40 Pokémon with your {W} Pokémon.
